scripts.releasezipold: npm run build && powershell Compress-Archive dist release.zip -Force && powershell Compress-Archive server.js release.zip -Update && powershell Compress-Archive package-lock.json release.zip -Update && powershell Compress-Archive package.json release.zip -Update
scripts.releasezip: npm run build && npm run release && powershell Compress-Archive release release.zip -Force
scripts.release: rmdir /S /Q release && xcopy /E /I /Y dist release\dist && terser --compress --mangle -o release/server.js -- server.js && xcopy /I /Y docker-compose.yml release && xcopy /I /Y certificates release\certificates && node packageInfoFilter.js && node utils/api-docs-generator.js && xcopy /E /I /Y docs\api\docs.json release\docs\api\
scripts.releasedocker: npm run release && docker build . && docker save squadwhitelister > docker-image.tar
